DOC.brief_summary: This 2 arm study evaluate efficacy safety Avastin + gemcitabine , Avastin + gemcitabine + attenuate dos cisplatin , first line treatment elderly patient non-squamous non-small cell lung cancer . Patients randomise receive either Avastin 7.5mg/kg iv day 1 + gemcitabine 1200mg/m2 day 1-8 3 week cycle , Avastin 7.5mg/kg iv day 1 + cisplatin 60mg/m2 day 1 + gemcitabine 1000mg/m2 day 1-8 3 week cycle . After 6 cycle combination therapy , patient continue receive Avastin monotherapy . The anticipated time study treatment disease progression , target sample size < 100 individual .
